message.content:
{"id": "14047", 
 "title": "Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap", 
 "description": "When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the redraw process becomes inefficient.", 
 "OB": "1. Open StyledText editor with word wrap enabled.", 
 "EB": "1. Open StyledText editor with word wrap enabled. \n2. Edit the text by adding or deleting characters.", 
 "SR": "To investigate the inefficient redraw process, add the following line to the performPaint method inStyledText.java: \nSystem.out.println(\"lineCount \" + lineCount + \", paintY \" + paintY + \", renderHeight \" + renderHeight);"}

origin.input_content:

{'id': '14047', 'title': 'Bug 14047StyledText  inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Add the following line toStyledTextperformPaint to see the redraws occurring:System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ",renderHeight " + renderHeight); '}
